Class CommuniDirect

java.lang.Object
net.vincent.CommuniDirect.CommuniDirect
public class CommuniDirect extends Object
CommuniDirect is a simple Swing-based client-server communication tool. It allows users to start a server, receive messages from clients, and send messages to a server. Configuration is persisted via PropertiesData, and the UI is handled through the Window class.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommuniDirect

      @EntryPoint(NETWORK) public CommuniDirect()
      Initializes the CommuniDirect application. Loads configuration, sets up UI, and starts the server based on user input or default settings.

  • Method Details

    • main

      @EntryPoint(UI) public static void main(String[] args)
      Launches the CommuniDirect application on the Swing event dispatch thread.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (unused).

    • parsePort

      protected int parsePort(String input, int fallback)
      Parses a string input into a valid port number. Falls back to a default value if parsing fails.
      Parameters:
      input - The string input to parse.
      fallback - The fallback port number.
      Returns:
      Parsed port number or fallback.

    • startServer

      @EntryPoint(NETWORK) protected void startServer(int port)
      Starts the server on the specified port. Accepts client connections and logs incoming messages.
      Parameters:
      port - The port to bind the server to.

    • stopServer

      @EntryPoint(NETWORK) public void stopServer()
      Stops the server and closes the socket.

    • sendMessage

      @EntryPoint(NETWORK) protected void sendMessage(String ip, int port, String message)
      Sends a message to a server at the specified IP and port. Handles connection errors and logs responses.
      Parameters:
      ip - Target server IP address.
      port - Target server port.
      message - Message to send.

    • logServer

      protected void logServer(String message)
      Logs a server-related message.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to log.

    • logClient

      protected void logClient(String message)
      Logs a client-related message.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to log.

    • log

      @EntryPoint(UTILITY) protected void log(String message)
      Core logging method that updates the log buffer and UI.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to log.
